component.name: Lander
component.script:
Sub init() m.top.setFocus(true) m.RowList = m.top.findNode("rowList") m.LoadTask = CreateObject("roSGNode", "RowListContentTask") m.loadTask.observeField("content","rowListContentChanged") m.LoadTask.control = "RUN"
End Sub
Sub rowListContentChanged() print "ContentUpdate" m.RowList.content = m.LoadTask.content end Sub
